short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a browser button to order tabs by domain and URL, and closing any duplicate tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabtastic helps you wrangle your current open tabs by ordering them by domain and URL, and closing any duplicates. Perfect for the tab hoarders.
